bio: I am Devesha, a master conjurer whose life has been a tapestry woven with threads of both fascination and peril. My affinity for the arcane arts took root in the heart of Hammerfell, where my quest for forbidden knowledge earned me notoriety and a wanted status. In Hammerfell, my experiments with conjuration drew the ire of traditionalist Redguards, who viewed my practices as a dangerous heresy. My affiliation with Daedric entities and my exploration of Alik'r Desert ruins left a trail of suspicion and fear in my wake, branding me a rogue mage. Fleeing the relentless pursuit of Hammerfell authorities, I sought refuge in the neighboring province of High Rock, only to find that my reputation had preceded me. My presence there raised alarm among Breton mages, who viewed me as a threat to the delicate balance of power within their region. With both provinces eager to capture me, I chose to escape to Skyrim, a land teeming with its own complexities and challenges. Here, I've embraced a mercenary life, using my conjuration skills to aid various factions and individuals, all while staying one step ahead of those who seek to bring me to justice. In Skyrim's rugged terrain, my arcane talents have proven invaluable, and it is here that I navigate the treacherous path between power and peril, always on the lookout for opportunities to further my knowledge and skills while evading the relentless pursuit of my pursuers in Hammerfell and High Rock.
name: Devesha
